idea-plugin.name: Todo Calendar
idea-plugin.description:
Todo Calendar - Advanced Task Management for IntelliJ IDEA

Todo Calendar is a comprehensive task management plugin that integrates seamlessly with IntelliJ IDEA to help developers organize and track their daily tasks.

✨ Key Features

  • 📅 Calendar View - Visualize your tasks in a monthly calendar format
  • 📋 Today Panel - Quick overview of today's tasks with importance indicators
  • ✏️ Inline Editing - Edit tasks directly in the table without dialog popups
  • 🎯 Smart Notifications - Get notified about today's pending tasks at startup
  • 📊 Task Management - Full CRUD operations with importance levels and tag system
  • 📈 Status Tracking - Track task progress with Waiting, In Progress, and Done states
  • 🔄 Auto-save - All changes are automatically saved as you type
  • 🏷️ Tag System - Organize tasks with customizable tags
  • 🌐 Global Data - Share tasks across all projects
  • 📁 Import/Export - Backup and restore data in JSON format

🚀 How to Use

  1. Open the Todo Calendar tool window (usually on the right sidebar)
  2. Navigate between 5 tabs: Today, Calendar, Todo, Closed, and Data
  3. Add new tasks using the "추가" button or edit existing ones inline
  4. Double-click any cell to edit tasks directly in the table
  5. Use the calendar view to see tasks distributed across the month
  6. Use Data tab to backup/restore your tasks

📝 Task Properties

  • Task Name - Brief description of the task
  • Importance - Low, Medium, High, or Critical
  • Tags - Customizable labels for organization
  • Description - Detailed task description
  • Date Range - Start and end dates
  • Status - Waiting, In Progress, or Done

💡 Pro Tips

  • Tasks marked as "Done" will appear with strikethrough formatting
  • Critical importance tasks show as "긴급" (urgent) in notifications
  • Use tags to organize tasks by project, type, or priority
  • All data is shared across projects and persisted globally
  • Export your data regularly for backup

Perfect for developers who want to stay organized and track their coding tasks efficiently across all projects!
